name: Novotel Toulouse Aeroport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for one night on our drive to Portugal. The room we stayed in was lovely, modern, well styled with a large bathroom and separate loo,very comfortable bed and spotlessly clean. The parking is free and WIFI is now free. There is a pleasant bar, a small but adequate swimming pool and some stuff for children to play with. It's a bit difficult to find so we were glad we had a satnav.
reviews.title: Lovely room in a clean pleasant environment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food in the restaurant was fine, we had dinner there. IWe found it a bit pricey with a rather limited choice but there was nothing wrong with it.
reviews.title: Poor chicken...

reviews.text: The people on the desk were very helpful. I was very pleased with our stay for the price {I found a deal for 62 euros on the web without breakfast} considering it is high season.
reviews.title: Fine Hotel, no pretences, value for money

reviews.text: Wouldnnt hesitate to recommend to anyone wanting a hot for a weekend or stopover.
reviews.title: Don't believe what you read

reviews.text: The hotel is oldstyled and should be rebuilded as soon as possible. The price is to high compared with the comfort. The real backlash at our stay - after that we had eating fantastic food earlier during our vacation - came with the chicken in the restaurant. Our youngest son prepares better chicken-dishes than the hotel. And he buys all food at Lidl and has no education as chef. So please stay away from this hotel. Novotel is a hotelchain with a good standard but Novotel in Toulouse - Purpan Aéroport - is an exception. My spouse asked me after the meal: "They haven't implemented the french kitchen in this hotel". And I answered her that we had better to go to Mc Donald's and eat Chicken McNuggets but unfortunately they had closed for that night.
reviews.title: Highly recommended 3 star hotel

reviews.text: I stayed here with my wife and daughter (4 years old) on the 15th August for one night, before travelling back to the UK. The hotel interior was to the usual Novotel format and good standard we had a Executive room which was spacious and maintained to a high level. The room had a very comfortable King size bed as well as a large sofa bed for my daughter. There is free wi-fi and also a Nespresso coffee maker which was very handy.
reviews.title: Fine Family hotel - service needs some improvement
visit
reviews.text: The bar and restaurant were pleasant however the service was a bit hit or miss particularly in the bar. The food options were also very limited and fairly expensive (be aware that the hotel has the same menu and buffets on offer for both lunch and dinner which was disappointing, especially as there was not a lot of choice).
The hotel building is obviously quite old however has been updated, and we spent a good few hours at the swimming pool which was generally quiet and very clean.
reviews.title: Great option for airport access

reviews.text: The hotel is located outside of Toulouse in a very in descript part of town, unless you are going to travel into town I would not bother going out of the hotel to look for bars / restaurants or anywhere remotely picture’s to walk around as you are defiantly in the concrete jungle.
reviews.title: Ok if in a pinch

reviews.text: Stayed three nights and found hotel very conveinient for airport and transport into city. Bus/tram service at the end of road. Staff friendly and helpful with all facilities in good condition. Rooms very clean and comfortable. Did not use restuarant as other options are a short distance away.
reviews.title: Right Place for a short stay
disappointed
reviews.text: The hotel was hard to find, located in a back street in some suburb of toulouse, a long way from the airport.

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.text: Reception and rooms were as good as always but the restaurant was severely poor.

Portions were uniformly small and poorly cooked. Our main course was forgotten by the serving staff who, 30 minutes after clearing the first course asked "would you like desert ?" For our second night we ate out.
reviews.title: Good value and a good idea if you don't want to drive into town

reviews.text: At breakfast it was impossible to get hot fresh coffee. When it was requested we were served a) tepid milk in a thormos, then b) tepid water in a thermos.
reviews.title: a feel-at-home hotel

reviews.text: Some colleagues and myself had stayed at this hotel for over a month, it was a really pleasant experience. The staff are extremely friendly and were always willing to assist us in any way they could. The rooms are very cozy and sheets are clean and you can always look for a good sleep after a tiring day at work. Would highly recommend this stay to all, whether its business or pleasure, Novotel Aeroport stands out to offer the very best of Toulouse.
reviews.title: Home away from Home....

reviews.text: I stayed in the hotel for about a month and I would say it is the place I am going to miss in time to come. Friendly and helpful staffs, especially the service executives at the counter. The restaurant staffs and room service staffs are just as great. Room is clean and spacious, bed is comfortable and fast internet connection(Free), transportation is provided between airbus, airport and hotel. Extremely helpful receptionist, they really concern about the guests and go extra mile to ensure the our well-being, I can't ask for more :) Strongly recommended hotel to stay if visiting Toulouse. Good Job, Claire, Aline, Alice, Jean, Charline.
reviews.title: My most pleasant stay at Novotel Aeroport

reviews.text: Hotel is a bit further from airport than we expected, but the accommodation was just what we needed after a long day. Rate was very good when pre-booked, but not great at short notice when we tried to book another night later in the week.
reviews.title: One night stop after late arrival at Toulouse airport
My review
reviews.text: I was having dinner with one colleague near the swimming pool when suddenly the lights were turned off. We complain with the waiter, and asked him about the situation… He told us that is automatic! Then he brought 4 candles to the table to allow us finishing dinner!

description: The Novotel Toulouse Aeroport is located 5 km from the centre of Toulouse. This 3 star hotel is ideal for guests on a business trip in the Toulouse region. We provide a free airport shuttle service operating from 5.30 a.m. to 12 midnight. In addition to123 airconditioned rooms with WiFi internet, the hotel offers several meeting rooms, a restaurant, a heated swimming pool and a tennis court surrounded by 2 hectares of gardens. Private parking for your convenience.
